49981.<voice 00359_00049981><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00359_00049981><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You're going to Gran Zedora Kingdom too,
aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49982.<voice 00365_00049982><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00365_00049982><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Heh heh. I'm sorry.
Please don't look so alarmed.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49983.<voice 00386_00049983><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00386_00049983><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>What you may not know is that...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49984.<voice 00416_00049984><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00416_00049984><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Your name is known to a surprisingly large
number of people, being the person who
defeated Nergel and all.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49985.<voice 00486_00049985><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00486_00049985><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>My name is Claws. I've been traveling the
world in search of someone.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49986.<voice 00536_00049986><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00536_00049986><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You are on your way to the bridge, aren't you?
I'd be happy to join you.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49987.<voice 00992_00049987><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00992_00049987><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>Mister Dudley! It's no where to be found!<stop_lip_animation n02030 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49988.<voice 01082_00049988><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01082_00049988><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>This is unbelievable... The compass just
disappeared into thin air...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49990.<voice 01394_00049990><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01394_00049990><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Our apologies, but we're a bit busy at the
moment...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49991.<voice 01455_00049991><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01455_00049991><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>The Magic Compass is gone, right?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49992.<voice 01495_00049992><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01495_00049992><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>N-no... Well, actually, uh...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49993.<voice 01535_00049993><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01535_00049993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I overheard your conversation from outside.
Without that compass, we can't pass through
the mist to Lendersia, can we?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49994.<voice 01570_00049994><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01570_00049994><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Y-yes, that is correct... However, the Captain
and the rest of the crew are searching for
it as we speak...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49995.<voice 01670_00049995><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01670_00049995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I really have get to Lendersia. There is
something I must do...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49996.<voice 01824_00049996><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01824_00049996><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Captain Abram! Did you find it...?<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49997.<voice 01923_00049997><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01923_00049997><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>I'm afraid that we weren't able to find it.
It looks like you had no luck either.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49998.<voice 02063_00049998><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02063_00049998><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>...Mmm? And you are?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49999.<voice 02304_00049999><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02304_00049999><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Excuse me for a moment.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50002.<voice 03157_00050002><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03157_00050002><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Oh, thats right! How could I forget something
so important!?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50003.<voice 03205_00050003><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03205_00050003><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>I had the Magic Compass replaced with a fake
one, just in case something like this should
happen.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50004.<voice 03239_00050004><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03239_00050004><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>The missing compass is the fake one... So the
real one is safe and sound. I apologize for
worrying everyone.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50006.<voice 03439_00050006><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03439_00050006><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>The ship will reach Lendersia without
incident. All right, everyone! Back to your
posts!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000816.<voice 03499_29000816><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03499_29000816><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>That... That Crows is a strange guy...<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000817.<voice 03500_29000817><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03500_29000817><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>What... Did he do that...<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50008.<voice 03719_00050008><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03719_00050008><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>I had no idea that there was a fake compass.
Would've never expected such a thing from
the captain...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50009.<voice 03954_00050009><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03954_00050009><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>...Well, Dudley? How is the search for the
compass coming along?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50010.<voice 04018_00050010><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04018_00050010><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Huh? Didn't you just say that the missing
compass was fake, and that the real one is
safe?<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50011.<voice 04114_00050011><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04114_00050011><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>MORON! What are you blabbering about! I don't know
anything about a fake compass!!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50012.<voice 04144_00050012><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04144_00050012><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Never mind! Everyone split up and search
every nook and cranny. Hop to it!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50014.<voice 04394_00050014><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04394_00050014><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Seems the captain's memory is a bit foggy.
I've seen this trick before.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50015.<voice 04424_00050015><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04424_00050015><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Anyways, do you remember that sailor with red
hair who left in a hurry? We need to follow
him.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74714.<voice 04444_00074714><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04444_00074714><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>He is most likely headed to the deck on the
first floor... I will meet you there.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50016.<voice 00111_00050016><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00111_00050016><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>I apologize for our unsightly behavior you had
to witness earlier.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50017.<voice 00183_00050017><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00183_00050017><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>The ship will soon be approaching the mist,
but... The compass is still missing.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50018.<voice 00223_00050018><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00223_00050018><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Everyone is welcome to the bridge, but there
is always at least two crewmen present. We
received no reports of anyone suspicious.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50019.<voice 00263_00050019><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00263_00050019><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>I looked away for a second, and the compass
vanished into thin air. I have no idea what
in the world happened to it...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50020.<voice 00310_00050020><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00310_00050020><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>If we don't find it, we'll sadly have to
return to Lendor. That's why we have to find
it, no matter what!<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50021.<voice 00370_00050021><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00370_00050021><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>...He said this thing's a fake? There's no way...<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50022.<voice 00625_00050022><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00625_00050022><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I'm impressed to see you got here first.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50023.<voice 00775_00050023><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00775_00050023><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>Y-you two... What are you staring at!?<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50024.<voice 00820_00050024><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00820_00050024><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>I can't believe I was tricked by this fake
compass!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50025.<voice 00875_00050025><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00875_00050025><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Wrong. There was never a fake compass.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50028.<voice 01085_00050028><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01085_00050028><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...We all must cross over to Lendersia, no matter what.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50029.<voice 01150_00050029><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01150_00050029><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I'm going to have to ask you to return that
compass.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50030.<voice 01236_00050030><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01236_00050030><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>DAMN IT ALL!!!! YOU LIED TO ME!!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50031.<voice 01323_00050031><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01323_00050031><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>I will NOT let you reach Lendersia!
Say goodbye to your compass!!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50032.<voice 01413_00050032><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01413_00050032><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Do what you want with it.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50033.<voice 01480_00050033><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01480_00050033><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Even if it sinks into the ocean, I will still
find it.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50034.<voice 01595_00050034><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01595_00050034><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>Damn you...! You really are a petty one!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50036.<voice 01820_00050036><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01820_00050036><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>I was told not to cause a commotion... But
it looks like I have no choice.<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50037.<voice 02195_00050037><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 02195_00050037><start_lip_sync m13800 _normal m00001>I am Mavok, messenger of the Netherlord
Nergel!<stop_lip_animation m13800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50038.<voice 02320_00050038><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 02320_00050038><start_lip_sync m13800 _normal m00001>By the Netherlord's will, none will ever set
foot on the land of Lendersia!!<stop_lip_animation m13800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50039.<voice 02645_00050039><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02645_00050039><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...I don't have time for this.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50041.<voice 03860_00050041><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03860_00050041><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Even after his death, it seems Nergel had
ordered his followers to prevent anyone from
crossing over to Lendersia...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50042.<voice 03925_00050042><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03925_00050042><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>What the hell is going on here!?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50044.<voice 04320_00050044><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 04320_00050044><start_lip_sync m13800 _normal m00001>Woe to those... Who tread upon... The land of...
Le...Lendersia...!<stop_lip_animation m13800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50045.<voice 05418_00050045><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05418_00050045><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Thank goodness it didn't get thrown into the
ocean. I was about to ask you to jump in
after it.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50046.<voice 05678_00050046><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05678_00050046><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>We finally have the compass back...<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50047.<voice 05763_00050047><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05763_00050047><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Many thanks for your cooperation! We will soon
be entering the mist! Please stay below deck
for safety!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50048.<voice 06158_00050048><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06158_00050048><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>That should get us to Lendersia... But it will
be some time before we arrive.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50049.<voice 06263_00050049><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06263_00050049><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>If you've finished all your business, you can
ask the room attendant to show you to your
room to rest until we reach port.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50050.<voice 06273_00050050><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06273_00050050><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>They're behind the counter on the first floor.
Please keep that in mind.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50052.<voice 00171_00050052><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00171_00050052><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>About to go and get some rest?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50053.<voice 00340_00050053><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00340_00050053><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Attention all passengers.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50054.<voice 00370_00050054><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00370_00050054><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>The ship is now entering the Mystifying Mist. We ask
that all passengers on deck please return to your
cabins immediately.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50055.<voice 00690_00050055><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00690_00050055><start_lip_sync n02029 _normal m00001>No good! The gauges are... None of our
instruments are working!<stop_lip_animation n02029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50056.<voice 00790_00050056><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00790_00050056><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>The wheel, too! I can barely steer it!<stop_lip_animation n02030 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50057.<voice 00900_00050057><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00900_00050057><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>So this... Is the Mystifying Mist's power.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50058.<voice 00970_00050058><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00970_00050058><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Please... Please don't let us down, Magic
Compass!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50059.<voice 01810_00050059><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01810_00050059><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>It's... It's no use...<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50060.<voice 02572_00050060><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02572_00050060><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>C-Captain! The helm! I can steer the helm!!<stop_lip_animation n02030 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50061.<voice 02727_00050061><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02727_00050061><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Very good! Head in the direction of that
beam of light!!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50062.<voice 03182_00050062><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03182_00050062><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Seems like things have calmed down.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50063.<voice 03288_00050063><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03288_00050063><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Let's leave the rest to the crew. For now, we
should get some rest.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50172.<voice 03818_00050172><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03818_00050172><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Why have we not arrived in Gran Zedora Kingdom...<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50065.<voice 03987_00050065><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03987_00050065><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>We're safely through the mist, but... The
currents are so strong that we can't get any
closer.<stop_lip_animation n02030 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50066.<voice 04182_00050066><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04182_00050066><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>No matter. Our top priority is landing on Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50067.<voice 04248_00050067><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04248_00050067><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>This is where the ship shall dock! Please
inform the passengers that they will have to
travel by foot to Gran Zedora.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50068.<voice 04707_00050068><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04707_00050068><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>May I have your attention, please. The ship
has now arrived in Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50069.<voice 04978_00050069><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04978_00050069><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>We have decided to anchor somewhere else
instead of Gran Zedora's port, as landing in
Lendersia is our highest priority.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50070.<voice 05053_00050070><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05053_00050070><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>For the time being, the crew is escorting passengers
to the beach.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50071.<voice 05187_00050071><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05187_00050071><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>For those of you heading to Gran Zedora
Kingdom, please head there on foot.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50072.<voice 05258_00050072><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05258_00050072><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>If you wish to return to Lendor, please speak
to the crew on the beach.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>
